titleInfo.title: Site for New Federal Bank at 8th and Union, City Beautiful Scrapbooks, 1958, Vol. 2 p37

mods.identifier: City Beautiful Vol 2 p37 Site for New Federal Bank 8th and Union 1958 001

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Site for the new Nashville Branch of the Federal Reserve Bank near the corner of 8th Avenue North and Union Street, March 1957.Taken by the City Beautiful Commission of Nashville, Tennessee, 1957. The City Beautiful Commission was established by the Mayor and City Council in June of 1953, for the purpose of improving the sanitation, cleanliness, and overall appearance of the City of Nashville. The Commission later became a division of Metro Parks in 1975, and then a part of the Metro Public Works division in 2005. Forms part of the City Beautiful Commission Scrapbook Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
